OUTFITS: deep-sea diver suit, rusted and cracked
LIGHTING: darkness so dense it feels alive
shifting shadows moving on their own
BACKGROUNDS: forgotten libraries bound in human skin
alien landscape beneath twin black suns
POSES: reaching into a void of swirling stars
standing at the edge of reality
EXPRESSIONS: with eyes wide in ecstatic horror
with vacant gaze lost to time
with trembling lips whispering forbidden names
CAMERA_ANGLES: from beneath as if from the earth itself
from high above as if watched by a god
tilted frame as if reality bends
ATMOSPHERES: air thick with decay and whispering wind
fog crawling with tendrils of shadow

HORROR_INTENSITY.Suggestive: as if something ancient lingers just out of sight
HORROR_INTENSITY.Unsettling: surrounded by symbols that seem to move on their own
HORROR_INTENSITY.Terrifying: with screams buried in silence, and flesh that forgets its shape
HORROR_INTENSITY.Nightmarish: as if the world is but a veil over a deeper, dying madness
